reference.title: cxxtypedef
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxtypedef> element is a reference to a C++ typedef.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxtypedef> element can be used to reference a C++ typedef from another topic type.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock:
<task id="connectionsxml"> <title>Connections</title> <taskbody>
<steps> <step><cm>Open the connection</cm> <info>You can use <cxxtypedef keyref="typedefkey">Connections typedef</cxxtypedef> in a C++ application.</info>
</step> ... </steps> </taskbody> </task>
